comment.author: 28696692@N08
comment._content:
Hello,
Is this the Polibio Diaz that had a photograph included
in Double Take in 2000 that appeared with a Julia Alvarez poem? 

I'm doing permissions editing for Bedford/St. Martin's who would like to include the image in an upcoming publication.

Please get in touch with me.
Thanks,
Susan Doheny
scdoheny@gmail.com
781.775.0523
